A proclamation for procuring obedience to ecclesiastical authority. Edinburgh, the eleventh day of October, one thousand six hundred and sixty six. Scotland. Privy Council. Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)
1 sheet ([2] p.)
Printed by Evan Tyler, Printer to the King's most excellent Majesty, Edinburgh : 1666.
Caption title. Imprint from colophon. Royal arms at head of text; initial letter. Text in black letter. Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
